description: The set of codes that describe the methods or devices used to measure an individual's height.
name: HSPC Height Meas Method Device

text.div:
HSPC Height Meas Method Device

The set of codes that describe the methods or devices used to measure an individual's height.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7,org/fhir/valueset-observation-heightMeasMethodDevice
